sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const ProblemSolution = () => { return (

Problem & Solution

Problems

  • Excessive Wait Time
  • Fragmented Patient Data
  • Lack of Transparency & Communication
  • Inefficient & Outdated Healthcare System
  • No Medical Emergency Services
  • Manual Prescription & Missed Follow Ups

Solutions

  • Appointment Booking with Real-Time Tracking: Doctro streamlines appointment scheduling by reducing wait times and providing live updates on hospital appointments, including queue position, number of patients, and delay notifications.
  • Ambulance Booking & Emergency Button: Doctro offers all types of ambulance bookings for medical emergencies, with an Emergency Button that instantly alerts the nearest ambulance and hospital for pre-arrival preparation.
  • Doctor's Practice Management Software: Doctro helps doctors manage patient records, e-pharmacy, e-diagnostics, appointments, queues, and e-prescriptions.
  • Virtual Consultation: Doctro allows patients to connect with healthcare professionals anytime, ensuring timely medical advice and consultations.
  • Health Records Management: Doctro centralizes medical histories, prescriptions, and lab results for easy access by patients and providers, ensuring data security.
  • Patient Meals & Medicine Delivery: Doctro offers personalized meal plans with delivery from nearby hospitals, restaurants, or canteens, along with affordable medicine delivery for patients.
); }; export default ProblemSolution;
